attributes.action: Allow Front Line Security Officers with SIA Licences to train and use handcuffs and extendable batons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Front line security officers/guards have as much chance of being seriously injured if not killed by an offender that they have detained.Most offenders are drug dependants who are desperate and or wanted on warrant already and do not want to be locked up.They do not think twice about pulling and using knives,blades,needles etc.By training Security Officers/guards to use and carry hand cuffs and batons as the police do.The security officer/guard has a better chance against the offender who is prepared to pull weapons and cause serious injury or death.Help and train security officers to protect themselves and not just become another statistic.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow Front Line Security Officers with SIA Licences to train and use handcuffs and extendable batons."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14755.asp
